input.sentences: we joined partners in hope to help restore this country .
we taught them irrigation techniques | gardening and sewing .
they are now on their way to being self sufficient .

output.sentences: The military volunteers joined Partners In Hope.
During their time volunteering, they taught teenagers various techniques, including sewing.
They helped these teens and children to be self sufficient.
The people they helped were very grateful.
At the end of their time there, they posed for pictures with the many people they met.
